title: Unpacking
description: Unpacking is a zen game about the familiar experience of pulling possessions out of boxes and fitting them into a new home. Part block-fitting puzzle, part home decoration, you are invited to create a satisfying living space while learning clues about the life you’re unpacking . Over the course of eight house moves, you are given a chance to experience a sense of intimacy with a character you never see and a story you’re never told. ITORAH
